title.@value: Intrauterine growth restriction associated with small for gestational age

definition.@value: These infants are classified as small for gestational age but have also been subject to intrauterine growth restriction.

codingNote.@value: When both birth weight and gestational age are available, priority of assignment should be given to birth weight.

label.@value: Intrauterine growth restriction associated with small for gestational age
fetal malnutrition without mention of expected weight for gestational age
